column2: yet the strongest man can't hold me for much more than a minute.

column1: "question": "What has a heart that doesn't beat?"

column2: but I grow; I don't have lungs
column3: but I need air; I don't have a mouth

column2: but I can die. I don't have a mouth

column1: "question": "What is always in front of you but can't be seen?"
"question": "I am taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case
column2: from which I am never released
column3: and yet I am used by almost every person.
